reviewText:
I got this just for it to not work on my computer. I don't know anything about DVDs and the like so I thought they were universal so I wasn't looking for a "this isn't compatible with region 1" message.

He said that he would refund the movies if I returned them. I did at the cost of me having to pay the international pay which was alright since I would still be getting that refund which would overshadow this.

It's been over two weeks and even though I E-mailed him HE DIDN'T ANSWER AND DIDN'T REFUND ME!!!!!!!!!
